about_the_game:
After inheriting a mansion from your late aunt, you arrive in Cleanland. Upon entering, you discover the mansion is infested with germs! Armed with a broom and your college degree in janitorial arts, you fight them off and meet a mysterious, small floating man who's in your new home. He introduces himself as Beau, sent by the big man upstairs, Q-Pid. Befriend the vibrant residents of Cleanland, and together, alongside Beau, clean up the town and uncover the mystery within your aunt's mansion!

Key Features:

  • Character Swapping Combat with 10 playable characters

  • Janitor jobs to fight germs and clean up the town

  • A wide variety of NPCs to interact with

  • Numerous town locations to explore

  • A central narrative revolving around your recently inherited mansion

  • 9 character routes to explore the lives and stories of Cleanland's inhabitants

  • A wide variety of items to use in combat

  • Voice acting

Armed with a broom and your college degree in janitorial arts, you fight them off and meet a mysterious, small floating man who's in your new home. Befriend the vibrant residents of Cleanland, and together, alongside Beau, clean up the town and uncover the mystery within your aunt's mansion!

name: Clean Sweep

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz
  • Memory: 3 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated Graphics
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Any
  • VR Support: None
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: 4.0 Ghz
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 2GB of VRAM
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 4 GB available space

short_description: A 3D, comedic, character-driven, action-RPG where everyone in Cleanland is a personification of a cleaning product! As the town janitor you'll befriend the residents of Cleanland and team up with them to fight germs!
